results.title: How Linkedin Is Stepping up for Its Employees Who Are New Parentsâ€”and Empowering Them in the Process.
results.shortDescription: Ask a handful of new moms where they pumped breastmilk when they returned from maternity leave, and the answers can vary from my car to a closet to I was too busy most days. Speaking from personal experience, I have pumped in a dark, dirty, windowless closet (hey, at least it locked), bathroom stalls, and even on a moving bus during a long commute.
results.longDescription: Ask a handful of new moms where they pumped breastmilk when they returned from maternity leave, and the answers can vary from my car to a closet to I was too busy most days.
